data.eml:eml: Scientists from INRA (French national agronomic research institute) and breeders from French seed companies have collected some wheat accessions representatives of breeding's history in France during the last centuries. Passport data for these genotypes have been recorded when available and some of accessions have been assessed for agronomical traits and/or diseases resistance. These genetics resources are maintained in seed genebank by INRA and are available under request.
